meanings.definition: A type of fur hat worn by Hasidic Jews.
meanings.sent1: The shtreimel kept his head warm during the cold winter.
meanings.sent2: He proudly wore his shtreimel to the synagogue on special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the shtreimel for a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The shtreimel perched on his head like a fluffy crown.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious shtreimel was a symbol of his heritage.

meanings.definition: To wear a shtreimel as a symbol of religious observance.
meanings.sent1: He would shtreimel every Sabbath to honor his faith.
meanings.sent2: The rabbi shtreimeled with reverence during the holy ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they watched him shtreimel with solemnity.
meanings.sent4: She shtreimeled gracefully, embodying tradition and devotion.
meanings.sent5: Shtreimeling was a sacred act that connected him to his ancestors.
